sentences.sContent: But what climate change shows us is that we are not in control, either of the biosphere or of the machine which is destroying it.
sentences.sContent_eng: But what climate change shows us is that we are not in control, either of the biosphere or of the machine which is destroying it.
sentences.sCn: 然而，气候变化向我们显示，无论是在生物圈还是摧毁生物圈的制度模式，我们都不处于控制地位。

sentences.sContent: If you start with a vision of the economy as a subsystem of the larger biosphere, as it grows, it takes into itself more and more of the total system.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you start with a vision of the economy as a subsystem of the larger biosphere, as it grows, it takes into itself more and more of the total system.
sentences.sCn: 如果你开始将经济看作是更大生物圈下的一个子系统，随着不断的发展，它从整个系统中汲取的资源也越来越多。
